## OWebI18n.setDefaultLang() method

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> use [OWebI18n.setLang()](./oweb.owebi18n.setlang.md)
> 

Sets default i18n lang code.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setDefaultLang(lang: string): this;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  lang | string | The i18n lang code. |
